catalog.name: Whole Atmosphere Community Climate Model (WACCM) Model Output

dataset.name: Whole Atmosphere Community Climate Model (WACCM) Model Output

documentation.xlink:title: NCAR RDA - Whole Atmosphere Community Climate Model (WACCM) Model Output(ds313.6)

metadata.documentation: The Whole Atmosphere Community Climate Model (WACCM) is a comprehensive numerical model, spanning the range of altitude from the Earth's surface to about 500 km to 700 km altitude. These model output files are used by the atmospheric chemistry community to create regional forecasts.
